1. Google’s Gmail Upgrade—Why You Need This New Email Address  Forbes

  3. I Gave Gemini Access to My Gmail, and It Weirds Me Out  PCMag

item.title: I got roasted for loving RTX 5060 gaming laptops — so I hit back with hard benchmarks - Tom's Guide
item.description:
1. I got roasted for loving RTX 5060 gaming laptops — so I hit back with hard benchmarks  Tom's Guide

item.title: The first direct comparisons suggests SteamOS destroys Windows 11 for gaming - Windows Central
item.description:
1. The first direct comparisons suggests SteamOS destroys Windows 11 for gaming  Windows Central
  2. Valve’s huge Steam Deck update is now ready for everyone, including rival AMD handhelds  The Verge
  3. SteamOS 3.7 brings Valve’s gaming OS to other handhelds and generic AMD PCs  Ars Technica
  4. I've swapped Windows for the latest SteamOS build on my Legion Go S and I'm not going back  PC Gamer
  5. A YouTuber claims that Windows was actively causing handhelds to run poorly, at least versus SteamOS  XDA

item.title: Another MSI yellow-tipped power cable burns on GeForce RTX 5090 - VideoCardz.com
item.description:
